column4: ï»¿hello .. i'm experiencing lots of trouble with Firebox under Ubuntu recently .. the browser window hangs (and turns grey) sometimes for seconds, sometimes minutes, sometimes indefinitely ... what can be the cause?
try dissabling some of the forgery protection
under security disable tell me about visiting an attack site or forgery,  though it is not ideal to dissable this extra security
ok, will try .. thanks .. you owe me beer if i get phished
